context_evidences: - Musk first came to the United States in 1992 after transferring from Queen's University in Ontario to the University of Pennsylvania. He said in an interview his decision attend school in the United States was based partly on his desire to get an education, but also because the move would allow him to remain in the country afterwards. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/elon-musk-illegal-immigrant/ published on 2016-02-11 06:47:13

- "It seems fitting that a dude who was suspended from practice for 12 years would write something this stupid and incompetent," tweeted First Amendment lawyer Ari Cohn, along with a screenshot of purporting to be of his legal disciplinary history. Reference: https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/frequent-msnbc-guest-ripped-plotting-strip-elon-musk-us-citizenship-stupid-incompetent published on 2022-11-01 04:00:09

- While the Tesla Motors co-founder spent more than ten years in the United States prior to becoming a citizen in 2002, it appears that he did so legally through various visa programs. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/elon-musk-illegal-immigrant/ published on 2016-02-11 06:47:13

- Twitter users across the platform were quick to lampoon Obeidallah. NewsBusters associate editor Nicholas Fondacaro quipped, "Dean wants to strip US citizenship from an African-American man." Reference: https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/frequent-msnbc-guest-ripped-plotting-strip-elon-musk-us-citizenship-stupid-incompetent published on 2022-11-01 04:00:09

- Musk enrolled at Queen's University in Ontario, Canada, in 1989. He transferred to the University of Pennsylvania on scholarship in 1992 and graduated in 1997. After graduating, he founded his first start-up, a city guide software company called Zip2. Reference: https://www.cnbc.com/2019/12/30/elon-musk-says-he-had-six-figures-in-student-debt-after-college.html published on 2019-12-30 18:43:14

- Soon after Musk left for Canada, his mother, Maye, moved to Canada too, along with Musk's brother, Kimbal, and sister, Tosca, according to the book " Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future ," by Ashlee Vance. (Maye was born in Canada and already had citizenship, which she passed on to Musk and his siblings.) Reference: https://www.cnbc.com/2019/12/30/elon-musk-says-he-had-six-figures-in-student-debt-after-college.html published on 2019-12-30 18:43:14
correction_response:
This tweet is potentially misleading. While it's true that a lawyer has expressed intent to investigate Elon Musk's citizenship application, it's important to note that this does not equate to a formal investigation by any legal authority. Furthermore, Musk has been a U.S. citizen since 2002 and there's little evidence to suggest he was ever in the U.S. without documentation. His immigration process appears to have been legal and through various visa programs. The lawyer's FOIA request for Musk's immigration application also requires Musk's consent before any documents can be obtained. 
https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/frequent-msnbc-guest-ripped-plotting-strip-elon-musk-us-citizenship-stupid-incompetent
https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/elon-musk-illegal-immigrant/
note_1_text: This tweet does not describe who these "prominent attorneys" are and does not provide a link or source to this claim. Musk has been a U.S. citizen since 2002 and has a security clearance with the DoD through his work with SpaceX.    https://www.esquire.com/news-politics/a16681/elon-musk-interview-1212/  https://time.com/5547914/elon-musk-security-clearance-pot/
note_2_text: As of 12/14/22, no noted news outlets have reported that Musk is under any such investigation by attorneys.    The genesis of the claim may be a tweet from lawyer, comedian and journalist Dean Obeidallah, who posted on 10/31 that he planned to investigate Musk's citizenship.    https://www.newsweek.com/elon-musk-being-investigated-over-his-us-citizenship-fact-check-1767025?amp=1

refute_evidences: - Obeidallah tweeted, "As a lawyer Im going to do research to see if @elonmusk in any way lied on his application for US citizenship," the commentator declared in a tweet. "I'll be making a FOIA request for his immigration application. If he lied anywhere on application we will move to strip him of US citizenship. Stay tuned." Reference: https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/frequent-msnbc-guest-ripped-plotting-strip-elon-musk-us-citizenship-stupid-incompetent published on 2022-11-01 04:00:09

- Musk moved to California in 1995, and in 2002 he officially became an American citizen: Ten years ago — ten years after his arrival in the New World — Elon Musk took the oath of American citizenship with thirty-five hundred other immigrants at the Pomona Fairplex, in a ceremony he calls 'actually very moving.' Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/elon-musk-illegal-immigrant/ published on 2016-02-11 06:47:13

- He followed up, "Just so everyone knows the facts, while I did make a FOIA request for Elon Musk's immigration application he has to consent to the request before I can get the docs. If he consents, I will share the file. If he refuses to consent then we must ask: What is Elon hiding?!" Reference: https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/frequent-msnbc-guest-ripped-plotting-strip-elon-musk-us-citizenship-stupid-incompetent published on 2022-11-01 04:00:09

- Musk indeed entered the United States an immigrant, but there is little evidence that he was ever in the U.S. without documentation. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/elon-musk-illegal-immigrant/ published on 2016-02-11 06:47:13
tweet_category: Technology, Social Media, and Big Tech
tweet_text: BREAKING: Prominent attorneys are investigating whether Elon Musk lied on his application for U.S. citizenship. If it shows that he lied anywhere on the application, its likely he could be stripped of his of U.S. citizenship and deported.
